comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Ryan M-2 (probably) NC3219 cn 10 'Bluebird'.

A sepia-tone version of this image exists elsewhere on SDASM.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/6057243398/]

comment.author: 72347661@N02
comment._content:
Doug Kelly wrecked the Bluebird when landing ( a passenger opened the door in flight to wave) but none was seriously hurt. Remains were used to finish another M-2.
Stig
